meanings.definition: A person who acquires or gains possession of something.
meanings.sent1: The acquisitor bought a new car yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The museum acquisitor added a rare painting to the collection.
meanings.sent3: The acquisitor found a lost puppy and became its new owner.
meanings.sent4: She was an acquisitor of knowledge, always seeking to learn new things.
meanings.sent5: The acquisitor's collection of vintage coins was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of acquiring or obtaining something.
meanings.sent1: The acquisitor of the company was celebrated by the employees.
meanings.sent2: Online shopping has made the acquisitor of goods much easier.
meanings.sent3: The acquisitor of the last piece of cake was the happiest person at the party.
meanings.sent4: His relentless acquisitor of wealth led him to success in business.
meanings.sent5: The acquisitor of rare books spent hours browsing through the bookstore.
